product_summary: Collie is a website search tool that indexes content and files from a website to create a searchable knowledge hub. It supports various file types, including PDFs, images, videos, audio, HTML, and text.
product_pros: Easy to use: One-click search bar integration
Comprehensive indexing: Supports various file types
Fast crawling: Efficiently indexes large websites
Free for small websites (up to 1000 pages/files)
product_cons: May not be suitable for large websites (over 1000 pages/files)
Crawling process can be time-consuming for large websites
Limited to public content (private content requires beta participation)

product_usecases.details: Create a searchable hub of all content and files on your website, enhancing user experience and accessibility.
Easily search and retrieve specific PDFs, images, videos, or other files from your website's content.
Uncover hidden or forgotten content on your website, facilitating knowledge sharing and content repurposing.
Gain insights into the content and files on your website, such as popular file types, content distribution, and potential areas for improvement.
Provide seamless customer support by quickly finding and sharing relevant content and files from your website's knowledge base.

product_toolfor.details: Enhance your website's search functionality and create a valuable knowledge hub for users.
Easily manage and search your content, ensuring it is easily accessible and discoverable.
Integrate Collie's search functionality into your website with the provided API.
Efficiently search and gather information from websites, streamlining your research process.
Quickly find and access relevant materials from educational websites, supporting your learning journey.

product_pricing: Collie is free for websites up to 1000 pages/files. For larger websites or private content search, contact the Mixpeek team for pricing.
